actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 94-464.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of House Resolution 335. Resolution establishing a select committee to study the problem of U.S. servicemen missing in action in Southeast Asia.

summary.text: Provides that upon the adoption of this resolution it shall be in order, notwithstanding the provisions of clause 2(1)(6), rule XI, to consider the resolution (H. Res. 335) establishing a select committee to study the problem of United States servicemen missing in action in Southeast Asia, in the House as in the Committee of the Whole.

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of House Resolution 335. Resolution establishing a select committee to study the problem of U.S. servicemen missing in action in Southeast Asia.
